title: Mastering Continuous Integration and Delivery with Jenkins
description: Welcome to the world of automation with Jenkins! This course equips you with the skills to implement a robust CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery) pipeline using Jenkins, a popular open-source automation server.

learning_outcomes.title: CI/CD Fundamentals
learning_outcomes.content: Grasp the core concepts of CI/CD pipelines and their role in streamlining software development and delivery. Explore the benefits of automation and faster feedback loops.

learning_outcomes.title: Introducing Jenkins
learning_outcomes.content: Dive deep into Jenkins, a free and open-source automation server used for building, testing, and deploying applications.

learning_outcomes.title: Building with Jenkins Pipelines
learning_outcomes.content: Learn how to define pipelines using declarative syntax or scripted pipelines (Groovy) in Jenkins. Explore stages, steps, and pipeline flow control.

learning_outcomes.title: Version Control Integration
learning_outcomes.content: Master how to integrate Jenkins with popular version control systems like Git for automatic builds triggered by code changes.

learning_outcomes.title: Building and Testing
learning_outcomes.content: Explore how to leverage Jenkins to automate building and testing your applications. Integrate build tools like Maven or Gradle and testing frameworks like JUnit or pytest.

learning_outcomes.title: Deployment and Delivery
learning_outcomes.content: Learn how to configure Jenkins pipelines for automated deployments to various environments (development, staging, production) using plugins or scripts.

learning_outcomes.title: Notifications and Monitoring
learning_outcomes.content: Understand how to configure Jenkins to send notifications about build status and integrate with monitoring tools for real-time insights into your CI/CD pipeline.

learning_outcomes.title: Advanced Jenkins Features
learning_outcomes.content: Explore advanced topics like pipeline security, managing distributed builds with Jenkins agents, and integrating with cloud platforms for infrastructure provisioning.
